definition[0]: the system of weighing things that uses the standard measures of the ounce, pound, and ton
definition[1]: a system of weighing things used in the UK and US, based on the standard measures of the OUNCE, POUND,  and TON,  which is being replaced in the UK by the METRIC SYSTEM
example[0]: There are 16 ounces to one avoirdupois pound.
